parameters.name: Addrs
parameters.description: The addresses whose source regions you want to query.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language to return some response parameters. Default value: en. Valid values: en, zh, and ja.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the addresses. Valid values:

*   IPV4: IPv4 address
*   IPV6: IPv6 address
*   DOMAIN: domain name
